snippet: Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, had one of his shortest and least contentious appearances on Capitol Hill since the recession started five years ago.
abstract: Federal Reserve chairman Ben S Bernanke has one of his shortest and least contentious appearances on Capitol Hill since the recession started in 2007, as he testifies before the Senate Banking Committee about the Fed's assessment that the economy will grow modestly in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, had one of his shortest and least contentious appearances on Capitol Hill since the recession started five years ago.

headline.seo: Bernanke’s Testimony to Senate Panel Features Less Steam
headline.main: Bernanke Has a Day of Sedate Testimony
headline.print_headline: Bernanke Has a Day Of Sedate Testimony
